Dyrhólaey, Iceland Winter 2024

Hello!

I'm a first year graduate student at UC Berkeley curious about representation theory, algebraic geometry, and mathematical physics, with particular interests in loop groups, affine Lie algebras, and the moduli of G-bundles on algebraic curves. Before that, I was an undergraduate at Cornell University.

You can email me at songyuye@[you-know-where].edu
